Data: [{"FeatureDescription":"Surface Book\u0027s one-of-a-kind hinge folds and detaches to transform from laptop,to clipboard mode,and then into a creative canvas.","FeatureTitle":"Meticulously crafted","Id":1},{"FeatureDescription":"Surface Pen combines 1024 levels of pressure sensitivity with low latency for a real pen on paper feeling.","FeatureTitle":"Natural writing experience","Id":2},{"FeatureDescription":"Our PixelSense\u2122 is a true-to-life screen technology designed for beauty, touch and pen.","FeatureTitle":"PixelSense\u2122","Id":3},{"FeatureDescription":"Surface Book uses Muscle Wire\u2122 to hold its screen in place securely, while still allowing it to detach perfectly with the push of a button.","FeatureTitle":"Detachable keyboard","Id":4}]
Name: Feature
